Good Afternoon

Sharedspace provides premium, feature rich, DDos Protected cPanel hosting ensuring your sites have a super smooth experience. Through the combination of CloudLinux, Litespeed web server and SSD drives we offer unparalleled performance for your website no matter the size! If you are looking for a fast, reliable and caring hosting provider then look no further than Sharedspace!

Special Offers:

As always we are running a special offer for our Webhostingtalk customers! We are offering a 50% recurring discount on all billing cycles. To claim 50% off simply use the code NOVEMBER50

Included with our packages as standard:


  • Latest version of CloudLinux
  • Litespeed webserver with LSCache
  • Nvme SSD Drives
  • All Accounts backed up to secure cloud storage with a 14 day rolling retention
  • Softaculous AutoInstaller
  • JetBackup for cPanel Hosting
  • Websites backed up to secure cloud storage
  • MariaDB Database server for cPanel
  • FREE SSL Certificates via LetsEncrypt for cPanel
  • Multi PHP Selector
  • 30 Day moneyback guarantee
  • 24/7/365 Support
  • 30 Minute support ticket response SLA (Average response currently 18 minutes!)

Frequently asked questions:


  1. How quick will my account be setup?

    Your account will be setup as soon as payment has been received
  2. My order was marked as fraud, what do I do?

    We use FraudLabs automated fraud screening. If your order gets marked by mistake, contact our sales team via the helpdesk and they'll work with you to verify the order manually.
  3. Can I use all my resources?

    Yes, we won't shut off your account for using the resources allocated to it!
  4. I need more disk space or bandwidth, what can I do?

    Simply contact the sales team and they'll quote you for a custom solution!

We look forward to working with you! If you have any questions please do get in touch with us and we'll be happy to assist! Contact us via sales@sharedspace.io or via our contact form through WHMCS! Livechat also available on the website for any presales questions!
